titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: The Chapter Meeting sate until 1.15 a.m. & agreed to charge a fee of £200 for the Ruskin Memorial. We received the Report of the Ctee on Copes, & decided to spend £300 in buying 4 new ones.
Frank Green came to see me in the afternoon: &, while he was here, Harvey Whitmore also came.
